channel.title: Please Help very soon on first script
channel.description:
[code][code][code]program NameTeller;
const Message1='Hi my name is "Dreyzar".';//Fill in your username inside the ""
pocedure Tellname; begin wait(3000) Writeln(Message1); end;
begin repeat tellname; until(false) end.[/code]
This is my first script and when i try to compile it says
Failed when compiling Line 8: [Error] (8:10): is ('=') expected in script
Someone please help me[/code][/code]

item.title: Please Help very soon on first script
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

You don’t actually need semicolons except for after consts or the program name but Its bad standards to exclude it from other parts of the script so you should put them at the end of the lines, and You don’t need spaces between = but it really comes down to a persons preferences.
I know Sumillion likes to have all the ='s in 1 column:
const
Message1 = ‘Hi’;
Msg2 = ‘Hey’;
Others = ‘Yo’;

Read full topic
item.source: Please Help very soon on first script

item.title: Please Help very soon on first script
item.dc:creator: @omg_omg_omg omg omg omg
item.description:
@omg_omg_omg wrote:

[code]program NameTeller;

const
Message1=‘Hi my name is “Dreyzar”.’;//Fill in your username inside the “”

procedure Tellname; <-----
begin
wait(3000); <-----
Writeln(Message1);
end;

begin
repeat
tellname;
until(false); <-----
end.[/code]

You forgot a couple of semicolons, too. And, like Nashi said,
you missed the r in procedure. However, you don’t need any spaces between message1=‘hi my name is “name”’.

Read full topic
item.source: Please Help very soon on first script

item.title: Please Help very soon on first script
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

You forgot the r in procedure.

procedure Tellname;
begin
wait(3000);
Writeln(Message1);
end;

Read full topic

item.title: Please Help very soon on first script
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

I think you might need to put a space in between “Message1='Hi”
so it looks like “Message1 = 'hi”

Not really sure though.

Read full topic

item.title: Please Help very soon on first script
item.dc:creator: @Bespinyoda Bespinyoda
item.description:
@Bespinyoda wrote:

[code][code][code]program NameTeller;

const
Message1=‘Hi my name is “Dreyzar”.’;//Fill in your username inside the “”

pocedure Tellname;
begin
wait(3000)
Writeln(Message1);
end;

begin
repeat
tellname;
until(false)
end.[/code]

This is my first script and when i try to compile it says

Failed when compiling
Line 8: [Error] (8:10): is (’=’) expected in script

Someone please help me[/code][/code]
